code:
import axios from'axios';const api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://192.168.1.6:5000'});// Add a request interceptor to include the JWT token
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const fullUrl="".concat(config.baseURL).concat(config.url);console.log(">>> API CALL: ".concat(config.method.toUpperCase()," ").concat(fullUrl));const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>{console.error('>>> API REQUEST ERROR:',error);return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
